favourite.article: Hallelujah! Who can from self deliver: His life is indestructible, By it He saves us to the full: Praise God, Heâ€™s fully able!
Such a High Priest is what we need.

I can just praise this Wonderful High Priest! No amount of praise is sufficient to thank Him for all He has become to us! O Lord Jesus! THANK YOU LORD! WE LOVE YOU AND PRAISE YOU LORD! Thank You for becoming our Pledge! Lord we praise You that You are able! PRAISE YOU LORD! YOU ARE!
Amen! This song brings joy unto me! May the Good Lord shower us with blessings as we meditate to this song!! Amen!

Hallelujah for the Lord's life in us! The Lord Jesus is so worthy of our praises! His life divine saves us to the uttermost, hour by hour, saving us from more than sin - from our self, our murmurings, reasonings, and everything both negative and positive that issues from the tree of knowledge!
I enjoy verse 5: He's pledged to save us to the full, His life is operating; He's doing everything for us 'Tis all for our perfecting; Our life's a failure at its best, Only His life can stand the test: His life brings full salvation!
I just have to praise the Lord - only His life can stand the test, only His life brings full salvation! Hallelujah - my life is a failure at its best! This is wonderful, although our life is a failure, His life can stand the test - Jesus is our victory! He is the wonderful One now operating in us and doing everything for us so that He may further perfect the mingled life within and carry out His full salvation which He pledged to us!
Oh Lord, may we put aside all our vain efforts and LET Your life operate freely in us. May we obey this wonderful, inner-operating God whose very life is fully able to save us to the uttermost! What a wonderful Saviour is Jesus Christ our Lord!
